full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): NO TITLE [@004A *, ,NA MO GU RU BHYA: 'DIR DPAL BDE GSANG 'JIGS GSUM DANG DBYER MED DU BYAS TE ZAB LAM BLA MA'I RNAL 'BYOR NYAMS SU LEN PAR 'DOD PAS, THOG MAR KUN SLONG KHYAD PAR CAN GYI NGANG NAS SKYABS SEMS SHUG DRUG TU BYAS TE, GNAS SPYI GTZUG BDE CHEN 'KHOR LO'I STENG,]
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,(ZHES PA 'DI YANG DAD LDAN DGE SLONG SKAL BZANG RDO RJES 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS TSUL MOL BAR BRTEN ^BLA MA LHA'I BKA' 'BANGS THA SHAL BAN CHUNG AAKshO BA BADZRA MING CAN GYIS SBYAR BA 'DIS KYANG BSTAN 'GRO YONGS LA PHAN THOGS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
